typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> fourthcust
fourthcust derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		GlobalCustomerID = add('2-',CustomerID)) ~> SourceSystemId
SourceSystemId select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID,
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fourthcocustadd'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> fccustaddout
